column4: hello i am trying to compile php from source files. I initially got it with apt-get, but i needed an older version. I configured PHP with mysql, ran make, then ran make install, restarted apache, and I'm still being prompted to download any PHP files in my localhost. Any help?
Did you enable the php module in apache?
With the php in the repositories its: sudo a2enmod php5
no i don't believe i did. Do I need to open httpd.conf to enable it?
